[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [320 000] Gesamtergebnisrechnung, Gewinn oder Verlust, Umsatzkostenverfahren but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, EgbEigentumernDesMutterunternehmensZuzurechnendesPeriodenergebnisNachAbzugDerDividendeFurZusatzlichesKernkapital, EgbSteuernUndAbgabenAufDasBankgeschaft, EgbDividendeAufZusatzlichesKernkapital All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.

Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520 000] Kapitalflussrechnungen, indirekte Methode includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 11,403,700,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 11,403,300,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 11,403,700,000 are comprised of the following:
+ OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss 83,100,000 + ProfitLoss 2,408,100,000 + EgbAnpassungenFurAbschreibungWertberichtigungenZuschreibungVonNichtfinanziellenVermogenswerten 606,600,000 + EgbAnpassungenFurGewinneVerlusteAusDerBewertungUndAusbuchungVonFinanziellenVermogenswertenUndFinanziellenVerbindlichkeiten210,600,000 + EgbAnpassungenFurZufuhrungNettoZuKreditvorsorgenUndSonstigenRuckstellungen 219,700,000 + EgbZahlungsstromeAusInBetrieblichenTatigkeitenAndereAktivaAusOperativerGeschaftstatigkeit -1,025,500,000 + The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
